name: Run n' Gun (itch) (Turtle_In_Space)
description:
Version: 1.0.1

A "run and gun" top-down-shooter.

Features: procedural generated levels, an online leaderboard and exploding doors.

Produced by myself, Turtle_In_Space,  for a school project and to learn Unity.

Credits:

Player sprites : Riley Gombart

https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-survivor-player

Explosion: klyaksun

https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/13224424-animation-sprite-sheet-of-bomb-explosion-sequence Vectors by Vecteezy
